title: Anton Rubinstein - Solo Piano Music (Leslie Howard) 1997 APE los
description:
Anton Rubinstein - Solo Piano Music (Leslie Howard - Hyperion) - 1997, APE (image +. Cue), lossless

Genre : Classical Year drive : 1997 Manufacturer disk : UK_Hyperion_CDD22023 Audio Codec : APE Rip type : image +. cue Bitrate : lossless Duration : 79 ' 05'' + 75'27'' Recorded on 6 and 7 October (Fantasy & Variations) and 21, 22 December 1994 Recording Engineer and Producer Tryggvi Tryggvason Editing and Post-Production Emma Stocker , Marian Freeman Design Terry Shannon Piano STEINWAY Prepared by Ulrich Gerhartz Executive Producers Joanna Gamble , Nick Flower Front illustration: Interior Room of the drawing in the house of Baron Stieglitz in St Petersburg by Pyotr Fyodorovich Sokolov (C 1787-1848) Hermitage, St Petersburg / The Bridgeman Art Library. London Leslie Howard , piano



Deux Melodies Op 3 (1852)
1 No 1 in F major (revised edition): Moderato ('Melody in F') [4'20] 2 No 2 in B major: Andante [3 '43] Deux Morceaux Op 30 3 No 1 in F minor: Premiere Barcarolle (Moderato) (1852) [5'36] 4 No 2 in D minor: Allegro appassionato (1856) [5'03] Trois Barcarolles 5 Deuxieme Barcarolle in A minor, Op45bis (Moderato assai) (1857) [6'32] 6 Troisieme Barcarolle in G minor. Op 50 No 3bis (Moderato con moto) (c'1858) [3'43] 7 Quatrieme Barcarolle in G major (Allegretto con moto) (c 870) [5'11] Fantaisie in E minor Op 77 (1866) 8 Adagio - Allegro con fuoco [13'50] 9 Moderato assai [7'05] 10 Allegro molto - Moderato - Allegro molto - Poco meno mosso - Presto [7'07] 11 Molto lento - Vivace assai - Tempo rubato - Quasi presto [16 '38] 


Trois Caprices Op 21 (1855) 
1 No I in F sharp major: Allegretto scherzando [2'34] 2 No 2 in D minor: Andante - Allegro [5'53] 3 No 3 in E flat major: Allegro risoluto - Andante - Tempo 1 [5'08] Trois Serenades Op 22 (1855) 4 No I in F major: Moderato assai [4'34] 5 No 2 in G minor: Moderato assai [ 6'21] 6 No 3 in E flat Major: Allegretto con Moto [8'44] Theme et Variations Op 88 (1871) 7 Theme: Lento - Allegro moderato (G major) [2'13] 8 Variation I: Allegro ( G major) [11'29] 9 Variation II: Andante con moto (E minor) [3'13] 10 Variation III: Moderato con moto (C major) [2'14] 11 Variation IV: Moderato (C minor) [ 3'25] 12 Variation V: Moderato (G major) [3'12] 13 Variation VI: Allegro non troppo (G minor) [1'37] 14 Variation VII: Moderato assai (E flat major) [2'32] 15 Variation VIII: Moderato assai (E flat minor) [4'45] 16 Variation IX: Moderato (B major) [4'20] 17 Variation X: Moderato (B minor) [2'20] 18 Variation XI: Allegro ( D major) [1'57] 19 Variation XII: Allegro moderato (G major) [8'44]
